tests.name: HTML Basics Test

questions.question: How do you insert an image in HTML?
What is the alt attribute in the tag?
What is the difference between
options: is for figures,
<figure> adds semantic meaning and can have a caption
questions.answer: <figure> adds semantic meaning and can have a caption

questions.question: How can you embed a video or audio file in HTML5?
What are the new media tags introduced in HTML5?
Which semantic elements were introduced in HTML5?
What is the purpose of the <canvas> tag?
What is the difference between SVG and Canvas?
options: Canvas uses HTML; SVG uses CSS
Canvas is pixel-based; SVG is vector-based
SVG is not interactive; Canvas is
questions.answer: Canvas is pixel-based; SVG is vector-based

questions.question: What is localStorage and sessionStorage in HTML5?
options: localStorage persists after browser close; sessionStorage does not
questions.answer: localStorage persists after browser close; sessionStorage does not
